member.name: T:WinFormsDragMove.DragMoveExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for automatic dragging of Windows Forms controls

member.name: M:WinFormsDragMove.DragMoveExtensions.DragMove(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Temporarily enables the DragMove behavior for the specified control, until the mouse button is released.

member.name: M:WinFormsDragMove.DragMoveExtensions.EnableDragMove(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables the DragMove behavior for the specified control.
member.param: The control for which the DragMove behavior must be enabled or disabled
A value indicating whether to enable or disable the DragMove behavior

member.name: M:WinFormsDragMove.DragMoveExtensions.IsDragMoveEnabled(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Checks whether the DragMove behavior is enabled for the specified control
member.returns: true if DragMove is enabled for this control; otherwise, false

member.name: T:WinFormsDragMove.DragMoveProvider
member.summary: Provides an extra property for controls to enable or disable the DragMove behavior.

member.name: M:WinFormsDragMove.DragMoveProvider.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DragMoveProvider class without a specified container.

member.name: M:WinFormsDragMove.DragMoveProvider.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DragMoveProvider class with a specified container. An IContainer that represents the container of the DragMoveProvider.

member.name: M:WinFormsDragMove.DragMoveProvider.CanExtend(System.Object)
member.summary: Renvoie true si le DragMoveProvider peut fournir une propriété d'extension à l'objet cible spécifié.
member.param: L'objet cible auquel ajouter une propriété d'extension.
member.returns: true si le DragMoveProvider peut fournir une ou plusieurs propriété d'extensions ; sinon, false.

member.name: M:WinFormsDragMove.DragMoveProvider.GetEnableDragMove(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Retrieves a value indicating whether the DragMove behavior is enabled on the specified control.
member.param: The Control for which to retrieve DragMove status
member.returns: true if the DragMove behavior is enabled for this control ; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:WinFormsDragMove.DragMoveProvider.SetEnableDragMove(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable or disables the DragMove behavior for the specified control.
member.param: The control for which to enable or disable the DragMove behavior.
A value indicating if the DragMove behavior must be enabled or disabled for this control.

member.name: M:WinFormsDragMove.DragMoveProvider.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:WinFormsDragMove.DragMoveProvider.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.
